meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious rosbif for dinner.
meanings.sent2: At the family gathering, everyone enjoyed the tender rosbif.
meanings.sent3: The rosbif was so tasty that it disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the rosbif filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust on the rosbif made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: A person from England, especially when referred to by the French.
meanings.sent1: My friend jokingly called me a rosbif because of my English accent.
meanings.sent2: In the history book, the French often used the term rosbif to talk about the English.
meanings.sent3: When I put on a top hat, my friends playfully called me a rosbif!
meanings.sent4: To the French, the English are sometimes seen as hearty rosbifs.
meanings.sent5: The French comedian made fun of the rosbif stereotype in his show.
